title: Science Problem-Solving Skills Improvement Program Through Online Collaborative Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific concepts and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: VR simulation-based training for current practitioners, conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners collaboratively derive scientific problem-solving solutions with peer practitioners via online discussion platforms.
Learners effectively apply perspective refinement and cognitive engagement strategies in three or more OCL (Organic Collaborative Learning) tasks.
In VR simulation environments, learners analyze and interpret scientific experiment data through real-time interaction with team members.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
